body:
I performed the same steps in Linux Ubuntu operating system and got the same error.
This example is no more working.
https://ludwig-ai.github.io/ludwig-docs/examples/#spoken-digit-speech-recognition
.
.
Help is appreciated.
Thanks in advance.

    /home/bharat/Desktop/awesome_python_project/ludwig/venv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/nn_ops.py:5022 dropout_v2
        "range [0, 1), got %g" % rate)

    ValueError: rate must be a scalar tensor or a float in the range [0, 1), got 1

@bharatsewani1993 Try `'dropout': x (0<x<1)` instead of  `'dropout': True` in the model definition. Also, you may skip defining `'dropout_rate': x (0<x<1)` in the training part of the model definition. Let us know if the error still persists. 

We would be updating the docs soon.

Thanks, @kanishk16,
It worked for me. :) 
Help is really appreciated. 
<3
